column1: 2.  The 2nd and 5th Respondents are not eligible to be members of the interview panel.
Admittedly, the Petitioners, who  joined the 1st  Respondent Authority as Tea  Inspectors
were  eligible to  be  promoted to  the  next  grade  known as  the  Zonal  Tea  Development
Extension Officers. The Petitioners applied to the said grade pursuant to the advertisement
published by the 1st Respondent (P17). The written examination was held on 24-03-2018
and the applicants who passed the written examination were called for an interview which
was scheduled to be held on 14-01-2019.
In the interview, the marks were allocated in the following manner.
